attributes.action: Make the EU referendum result null and void.
attributes.additional_details: Both Scotland and Northern Ireland voted to remain and now this referendum result has threaten the very existence of our great nation with calls for an independence referendum in Scotland and a unified Ireland. This referendum would see our country crumble, our economy has already fallen, many countries and banks are pulling out of the UK as a result. It is our duty as the people to ensure that our country stays strong and our democracy isn't crushed.
attributes.background: The UK represents 4 nations. It is unfair and undemocratic that the UK can leave the EU without the unanimous decision of all 4 nations and their people. As Scotland and Northern Ireland voted to remain, this referendum does not represent the UK in its entirety.
